name: Drawmania - Draw & laugh!
description:
Drawmania is a game about drawing and guessing. It is similar to the "telephony" game, except you have to draw!

In each game you will either draw an image based of what somebody else has written, or write a caption for a drawing.

Each game is made up of 9 players. After the last player has finished you will see the result!

This is a very early release of the game. If you have any feedback or questions, please please don't hesitate to join us on Discord! https://discord.gg/KFaKsp5

Happy drawing!
